skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have hands-on experience with front-end development, building responsive and accessible websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. I enjoy bringing creative UI designs to life with clean, maintainable code and have also been introduced to basic back-end principles. I'm always excited to learn new technologies and improve the user experience through design.

skills.title: Soft-skills
skills.description: My strengths include leadership, collaboration, adaptability, and creativity. I’ve led classroom environments and worked effectively in team settings during school projects. I adapt quickly to new challenges and love thinking creatively to solve problems or add unique flair to projects. I'm committed to continuous growth and open to learning from others.

skills.title: Education
skills.description: My background in early childhood education gave me a strong foundation in communication, empathy, and structured learning. My teaching certification and preschool experience helped me develop a deep understanding of how people learn — a skill I apply in team settings and user-focused design. This experience taught me how to translate complex concepts into clear, usable content.

skills.title: Other skills
skills.description: In addition to web development, I’ve explored C++ and Python, and I’m currently learning Swift and mobile development with SwiftUI. I’m also interested in cybersecurity and plan to specialize in secure web practices — especially where sensitive data or payments are involved. I aim to bring a security-first mindset into both web and mobile development.

portfolio.title: Task Adventure
portfolio.description: A gamified iOS app helping children with autism build routines. Features animations, XP badges, and parent/child sync.

portfolio.title: SecureChat
portfolio.description: A secure, encrypted chat app for local network communication with file sharing and emoji support.

portfolio.title: Dream Builder AI
portfolio.description: A web app that expands user-submitted dreams using natural language generation.
